WRITING.TEXT: Liberal Studies - Half the idiots in here will be teaching your children. Good luck!

When repairing a computer, Have you ever come across a virus that looks like something from a movie. Like really evil looking and frightening? on the opposite side, have you found anything that was just downright hilarious?

WRITING.TITLE: Is it possible for there to be a Star Wars themed world in the next Kingdom Hearts?
